strapiPost.title: J.B. Hunt Aims To Dramatically Reduce Carbon Emissions
strapiPost.content:
As part of its vision for sustainability, J.B. Hunt Transport Services plans to reduce its carbon emission intensity 32% by 2034

  • A better future: As one of America’s largest supply chain providers, this ambitious goal could pave the way for the freight industry towards a low-carbon future. 
  • Objectives: The company will pursue this goal by incorporating alternative powered equipment into its fleet, expanding the use of biogenic fuels, and improving fuel economy, 

Read more about J.B. Hunt’s plans HERE.
